g@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Rent <Rent@chalhoub.com>; Shant Daldalian <Shant.Daldalian@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2025-09-17 18:49
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE Re-Opening - Bernardaud  Boutique- Dubai Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have Re- Opening of Bernardaud at Dubai Mall” The date of the unit handover on 3rd Oct and re-opening date on 5th Oct 2025.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task. 

 

Regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK	
​​​​	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO	
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
‑	
	
 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/>

chunks.text:
@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure CCTV camera and NVR are installed on 2nd Oct before trading hours. And ensure that it’s connected to control room because stock will be received on 2nd Oct as well after 10am.

 

@Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com>  to arrange Water dispenser delivery on 2nd Oct.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  kindly arrange the Insurance Certificate before the re-opening.

 

Kindly feel free to reach out if any inquiries.

 

Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK	
​​​​	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO	
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC	
DUBAI
